name: Best Ever Chocolate Cake
ingredients: 1 pkg. (8 squares) semi sweet baking chocolate, divided 1 c. sour cream
1 pkg. chocolate cake mix ½ c. oil
1 pkg. (4 serving) Jell-­‐o Chocolate Flavor Instant pudding ½ c. water
steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease 2 9-­‐in. round baking pans. Chop 2 of the chocolate
squares; set aside. Beat cake mix, dry pudding mix, eggs, sour cream, oil and water in a large
bowl with electric mixer on low speed just until moistened. Beat on medium speed 2 min. Stir in
chopped chocolate. Spoon into prepared pans. Bake at 30-­‐35 min. or until wooden toothpick
inserted in center comes out clean. Cool in pans on wire racks for 10 min. Loosen cakes from
sides of pans. Invert onto racks; gently remove from pans, cool cakes completely.
Place frozen whipped topping and remaining 6 chocolate squares in microwavable bowl.
Microwave on high 1 ½ min. or until chocolate is completely melted and mixture is smooth,
stirring after 1 min. Let stand for 15 min to thicken. Place 1 cake layer on serving plate; top with
¼ of the chocolate mixture and the second cake layer. Spread top and side with remaining
chocolate mixture. Garnish with almonds. Store in refrigerator. The fudge-­‐like texture of this
cake improves if stored overnight in the refrigerator.
